info.title: Rest Api documentation
info.description: Implementation of Swagger with in Laravel

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search businesses by query string value.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort businesses by query string value.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter businesses by query string value. (by category.id, by raiting)

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.summary: Get count of businesses per day

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: Filtering by owner id (available only for admin)

from.title: from
from.description: Start id of item on current page

to.title: to
to.description: Last id of item on current page

total.title: total
total.description: Count of items on current page
